name: Mister Sly's Tale
description:
y name is July and... I've grown tired of my life.

...

With each new day in the real world, I wanted to sleep more and more. Do not wake up, do nothing, just sleep.

My desire grew and grew...

No matter how much I slept, it wasn't enough for me.

I didn't want to participate in my life.

I didn't want to see people, I didn't want to do my favorite things, nothing attracts me, as much as a dream.

But, I had no idea, that because of this desire, one day, in a dream, I would meet Mr. Sly.

At first, I thought, it was just a stupid dream, with a strange character. But that was a huge mistake.

Mr. Sly turned out to be a demon of sleep paralysis.

One day, he invited me to play his game. I regret it now, I should not have agreed to that.

Each game was terrifying and brought a lot of pain.

I was scared to fall asleep because of him.

...

I have nowhere else to run...
